msg: Test some practical applications of Issue #2769 fix allowing empty rev ranges.

author: pburba
msg: Fix svn:mergeinfo propset in merge_to_switched_path merge test.
(merge_to_switched_path): Use canonical path during svn:mergeinfo propset.

author: hwright
msg: Pass the include_merged_revisions parameter to the repos layer.
